src.alt: Annie Oberholtzer, laughing and smiling with a fencing sword in hand
Annie, crouching near railroad tracks, in a ponderous pose
Annie, running her hand through her hair near a tree

p: I graduated Summa Cum Laude from Missouri State University with a BFA in Acting, an On-Camera Certificate, and a Criminology minor.
Born and raised in sunny Davis CA, I now live in New York City.

I'm passionate about fight choreography and adapting and interpreting Shakespeare. I recieved a Basic Actor Combat Certification from Fight Directorâ€™s Canada and have direct fight choreography for high school classes. I also assist in teaching combat for stage and screen to children and young adults.
Outside of the theater, you can find me at coffee shop with a chai lattte, or baking, with my dog Sammy at my feet.
